name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 20, the Chongqing Foreign Languages School campus wall account was suspended by the school on the grounds of damaging the school's reputation because it exposed the frequent presence of foreign objects such as steel wool and insects in the school cafeteria meals, as well as problems with charges and services. The food safety issue was also left unresolved.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
At 12:10 am on March 24, Zhangzhou, Fujian.
A car crashed into a night snack stall and left.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
March 21st, Hengyang No. 1 Middle School, Hunan Province.
A student jumped to his death after being criticized by his head teacher for playing with his mobile phone in class.
The parent sought help in the parent group, but was kicked out of the group.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 23, near the Yellow Crane Tower in Wuhan, a woman held up a sign to protest against the leadership of China Construction Third Engineering Bureau who violated regulations by assigning a full-time driver to be on call 24 hours a day, resulting in death from overwork. The family members did not receive any condolences or visits for 8 days after the incident.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 24, a man was seen running naked on the streets of Nanning, Guangxi, smoking and holding a red bag, and then drove away on a shared electric motorcycle.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Neighbor Lemenkou, West District, Kaixuan New Town, Huaiyin District, Jinan City, Shandong Province

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On March 23, a man used a translation software to show his goodwill to a group of Russian high school students, saying, "No matter what difficulties Russia encounters, the Chinese will always stand by Russia." The students applauded after hearing this.
Then the man went on to say that he was a fan of Putin, and there were hundreds of millions of Putin fans in China, and we all admired Putin.
After hearing this, the students smiled and said nothing, but in the end they thanked the man.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 23, Shanghai, some citizens went to the gate of the Russian Consulate to lay flowers and observe a moment of silence for the victims of the Moscow terrorist attack.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 24, an institution called "Jin Yi Hui" in Wuhan Impression City ran away, and parents defended their rights

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 18, a notice from the School of Electronic Information and Computer Engineering of Sichuan University of Technology showed that a student was given a warning for repeatedly using VPNs to browse overseas websites between February 29 and March 11 and copying and forwarding some of the content to a WeChat group.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a modern Chinese reading question "Azalea Falls" on the ninth-grade Chinese test paper in Xindu District, Chengdu, Sichuan, has caused controversy. It is currently reported online that the People's Congress representative of Xindu District has been investigated for this, and some schools have confiscated and burned the test papers.
Netizens believe that this article is narrated from the perspective of the Japanese invasion of China, and the Japanese invaders are written so tragically, which is a bad guide. Some netizens also said that the Education Bureau was infiltrated by Japan.
As of now, the article "Azalea Falls" on the Baijiahao platform has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On March 23, a man streaked in Yongqiao District, Suzhou City
There have been quite a few streaking cases recently

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: March 23, Linyi, Shandong. Country Garden Genting was left unfinished. Owners gathered in front of the city government building and demanded to "see the mayor and hand over the houses."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 24, at the Nanjing 2024 International New Energy Vehicle Exhibition, a man suddenly accelerated while test driving at the Zeekr booth and knocked down several people and several cars before stopping at the BYD booth opposite.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A blogger has created a yearbook of intern suicides from 2017 to 2024
